title: How to Create a Wordpress Website From Scratch in 10 Minutes
tags: how to create a website from scratch
how to create a website from scratch in wordpress
how to build a wordpress website from scratch
description: Here is how to Create A Website by using WordPress theme.  Video Content  Step 1 - Buy a domain name Step 2 - Buy a hosting Step 3 - Link the domain and hosting with 2 name server Step 4 - Installed WordPress on the hosting control panel Step 5 - Installed a theme inside the WordPress Step 6 - Customize our theme a bit add pages and post to our site.    For Any help or if you want to hire me, send me an email at - mrinalisonline@gmail.com  [Resources]  We bought a domain from name.com and hosting from HostGator.
